mapper.select: /* sql_id : readMainNtcList */ /* * 1. 파일 : MainNtcMapper_SQL.xml * 2. 기능 : 메인 공지사항 조회 * 3. 작성자 : 최중혁 * 4. 변경이력 : 2025.10.31 - 최중혁 : 최초작성 */ select org_cd as orgCd , bltn_no as bltnNo , bltn_dvs_cd as bltnDvsCd , tpw_bltn_rgt_dtm as tpwBltnRgtDtm , ntc_mttr_ttl_nm as ntcMttrTtlNm , ntc_mttr_ctt as ntcMttrCtt , main_exps_yn as mainExpsYn , main_exps_stt_dt as mainExpsSttDt , main_exps_end_dt as mainExpsEndDt , use_yn , inqr_ncnt as inqrNcnt , rgsr_id as rgsrId , rgt_dtm as rgtDtm from ohxzown.tbhxzm113 where bltn_dvs_cd = '0' and use_yn = upper('y') order by rgt_dtm desc limit 5;

/* sql_id : readMySvcList */ /* * 1. 파일 : MainMapper_SQL.xml * 2. 기능 : 현재 가입한 서비스 목록 조회 * 3. 작성자 : 최중혁 * 4. 변경이력 : 2025.11.11 - 최중혁 : 최초작성 */ select m009.org_cd as orgCd , m009.tpw_org_nm as tpwOrgNm , m201.tpw_svc_id as tpwSvcId , m201.tpw_svc_nm as tpwSvcNm from ohxzown.tbhxzm201 m201 join ohxzown.tbhxzm009 m009 on m201.org_cd = m009.org_cd and m009.use_yn = upper('y') join ohxzown.tbhxzm102 m102 on m201.tpw_svc_id = m102.tpw_svc_id and m102.mbrs_id = #{mbrsId} and m102.tpw_mbrs_svc_sta_cd = '04' where to_char(now(), 'yyyymmdd') >= m201.tpw_svc_stt_dt and to_char(now(), 'yyyymmdd') <= m201.tpw_svc_end_dt and m201.use_yn = upper('y')

/* sql_id : readMainSvcList */ /* * 1. 파일 : MainMapper_SQL.xml * 2. 기능 : 현재 가입하지 않은 서비스 목록 조회 * 3. 작성자 : 최중혁 * 4. 변경이력 : 2025.11.11 - 최중혁 : 최초작성 */ select m009.org_cd as orgCd , m009.tpw_org_nm as tpwOrgNm , m201.tpw_svc_id as tpwSvcId , m201.tpw_svc_nm as tpwSvcNm , case when m102.mbrs_id is not null then true else false end as joinYn from ohxzown.tbhxzm201 m201 join ohxzown.tbhxzm009 m009 on m201.org_cd = m009.org_cd and m009.use_yn = upper('y') left join ohxzown.tbhxzm102 m102 on m102.tpw_svc_id = m201.tpw_svc_id and m102.mbrs_id = #{mbrsId} and m102.tpw_mbrs_svc_sta_cd = '04' where to_char(now(), 'yyyymmdd') >= m201.tpw_svc_stt_dt and to_char(now(), 'yyyymmdd') <= m201.tpw_svc_end_dt and m201.use_yn = upper('y')
